暕字的基本解释

暕
jián
阴雨天晴。

暕
lán
阴干。

暕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎn］
［《廣韻》古限切，上産，見。］
(1)明；阴雨后晴。
(2)用于人名。南朝梁有王暕；隋有杨暕；唐有李文暕。

暕字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　暕； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页498第19
【廣韻】【正韻】古限切【集韻】賈限切，?音?。隂旦日明。【玉篇】明也。　又【集韻】郞干切，音闌。隂乾也。

暕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
暕字的起名意思

明；阴雨后晴；用于人名。

Basic explanation of words
Chi
jián

Chi
lán

Chi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎn］
["Guangyun" ancient limit cut, high production, see. ]
(1) Ming; sunny after rain.
(2) Used for names. In the Southern Dynasty, there was Wang Wei in Liang; in Sui Dynasty, there was Yang Wei; in Tang Dynasty, there was Li Wenwei.
Chi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Department] 　暕; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 498 Page 19
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ancient limit cut [Ji Yun] Jia limit cut, "yin?". Day and night. [Jade articles] Ming Ye.　[Jiyun] Yun Qianqie, sound spine. Dry in the shade too.
